settings.text: The Next Level All-In-One Flagship Device That Makes Your MusicÂ Listening Experience A Pure Delight

settings.content: The FiiO R9, a top-tier all-in-one digital media streamer, seamlessly combines flagship-grade transmission, decoding, headphone amplification, and preamp features in a single device, boasting an extensive array of inputs and outputs, ten operating modes, an Android open OS, a 6-inch FHD+ Portrait screen, and a luxurious metal bicolor design for a thoroughly enhanced desktop HiFi experience.

settings.title: Features Dual ES9038PRO DAC Chip From ESS Sabre
settings.content: Utilizing the proven ES9038PRO DAC featured in previous models like M17, Q7, K9 Pro SS, and M15S, the R9 leverages dual ES9038PRO DACs, dedicated to the left and right channels. Each DAC chip comprises 8 independent D/A converters, arranged in parallel for fully differential output, delivering precise, clear, and full sound quality with impressive -122dB THD+N and 132dB DNR.

settings.title: THX Amplification Technology
settings.content: Featuring an advanced 8-channel THX AAA 788+ headphone amplifier, the R9 employs a four-way fully balanced design, with headphone amps connected in parallel for improved transient performance. The optimized circuit layout and efficient heat dissipation, facilitated by comb-shaped heat sinks, enable continuous and stable high-power output, reaching an impressive 7300mW per channel at 32 ohms, marking a 102% increase compared to the R7.

settings.title: 5-Step Gain Settings
settings.content: The FiiO R9 achieves remarkable audio performance through its five-stage audio architecture, featuring precision-crafted IV, LPF, gain, pre-amplification, and current expansion stages. Utilizing OPA2211 op-amps manufactured with the silicon-germanium (SiGe) CMOS process, the chip ensures exceptional performance. With a variable gain and variable power supply voltage design, the R9 offers 5 levels of gain, providing precise control over your preferred listening volume. Whether using IEMs or demanding headphones, a superior listening experience is guaranteed.

settings.title: Carefully Designed PCB
settings.content: The R9 incorporates separate boards for its internal power supply, digital components, DAC, and headphone amplifier, with additional metal shields isolating the DAC and THX headphone amp sections. This meticulous separation of the four crucial elements in the audio circuit prevents crosstalk, guaranteeing accurate, clean, and dynamic audio signal processing and output.

settings.title: Numerous Inputs & Outputs for Easy Connectivity and Scalability
settings.content: The FiiO R9 features connectivity far beyond what you would expect from a device with which you can quickly and easily build a desktop HiFi system with the R7 as the heart of it. The front panel has 6.35mm (SE), 4-pin XLR & 4.4mm Balanced headphone outputs. The rear panel is where the magic lies. It hosts a microSD card slot which supports up to 2TB if you like to play offline files on the go. It has Single-Ended RCA and 3-pin XLR Balanced lineouts. Surprisingly it also has a USB host interface that supports external USB devices like decoders, hard disks, keyboards, and expansion hubs. It also offers Optical & Coaxial IN/OUT and an Ethernet port for wired connection to a network. The USB Type-C port (USB 3.0) on the R9 supports data transfer, DP output mode, USB DAC, and USB HOST-related functions. The R9 has a Bluetooth and WiFi antenna embedded into the rear panel with a power switch allowing you to switch between DC or AC power supply seamlessly.

settings.title: Bluetooth and Dual-Band WiFi Support
settings.content: The FiiO R9 supports Bluetooth connectivity through a dedicated Qualcomm chip, featuring standards such as LDAC, aptX HD, AptX, SBC, and AAC. The operation is designed to be user-friendly, with dedicated buttons for the most commonly used parameters.

settings.title: 6-Inch Full-Fit Intuitive Touch Screen & Android Open OS
settings.content: The R9 is equipped with a spacious 6-inch HD screen, providing an elevated user experience. The vertical (portrait) display, paired with the open Android OS, ensures intuitive navigation and allows users to effortlessly install and use third-party streaming music and other applications. The Android OS is meticulously refined to eliminate concerns about app compatibility issues.

settings.title: Classic Metallic Bicolor Scheme
settings.content: The R9 showcases a flagship aesthetic with its distinctive metallic bicolor design reminiscent of luxury cars. Its body incorporates a protective layer of body-colored 4H PET, preventing fingerprints and scratches. The high-density metal body enhances durability, reducing deformation and minimizing sound performance degradation due to vibrations, ensuring the stable delivery of high-quality music.

settings.title: 4-Pin XLR Headphone Jack
settings.content: The Balanced connection decreases crosstalk and interference caused by the balanced output configuration resulting in improved audio signal integrity. As a result, the sound is reproduced with improved channel separation and increased dynamic range, making it cleaner and more accurate.

settings.title: 4.4mm Pentaconn Headphone Jack
settings.content: The Balanced connection decreases crosstalk and interference caused by the balanced output configuration resulting in improved audio signal integrity. As a result, the sound is reproduced with improved channel separation and increased dynamic range, making it cleaner and more accurate.

settings.title: 6.35mm Headphone Jack
settings.content: This is the most commonly found headphone jack with which you can pair your less power-demanding headphones. The larger size of the jack provides a secure connection that is less prone to accidental disconnection or damage, ensuring a stable audio signal.

settings.title: Volume Control
settings.content: R9 has a smooth volume knob that has 120 steps of volume control and it also displays the gain which you are currently at when you are toggling between the perfect volume for your set of speakers or headphones.

settings.title: Multiple Operating Modes
settings.content: The R9 offers a versatile experience with ten operating modes, providing flexibility for various audio scenarios. These modes include Android mode for third-party apps and major streaming services, pure tone mode for an exclusive immersive music experience, USB DAC mode for enhanced sound from computers/smartphones, Bluetooth receiver mode supporting aptX adaptive/LDAC codecs, AirPlay mode for wireless connection to iOS devices, Roon Ready mode for serious music enthusiasts, coaxial/optical input modes for high-end audio decoding, HDMI input mode for devices like game consoles/Blu-ray players/set-top boxes, and HDMI ARC mode for audio return from TVs/projectors.

settings.title: Output Selector Knob
settings.content:
• PO + PRE-OUT
    The R9 allows you to switch between your devices and listening modes using the control knob. You can use the R9 in PO+PRE OUT mode, wherein you can connect your powered speakers and your preferred choice of headphones at the same time. Provided outputs are RCA and XLR for connection for PRE-OUT mode.
  • PO
    The phone out (PO)Â  mode is simple and can be used when you just want to listen to your preferred choice of headphones.
  • PRE-OUT
    This mode allows you to pair your powered monitors and use the R9 as the source and a preamp for your powered speakers. Provided outputs are RCA and XLR for connection for PRE-OUT mode.
  • LO
    Line out (LO)Â  mode allows you to pair your powered monitors and use the R9 as the source and a preamp for your powered speakers. Provided outputs are RCA and XLR for connection in LO mode.

settings.title: Bluetooth Remote Control
settings.content: Want to listen to your music without having to get up? The RM3 bluetooth remote control allows you to control music from a distance through buttons and gestures even for complex operations.

settings.title: Honeycomb Vents For Heat Dissipation
settings.content: The side honeycomb vents serve as both heat dissipators and as a futuristic touch; A recessed rear panel means more elegant wire connections and less clutter. The seamless WiFi/Bluetooth antenna packs many capabilities in a simple square inch. The customizable RGB lights give your desktop setup some extra personality.Â

settings.title: Dual Power Supply Design for Clean and Silent Background
settings.content: Electricity is the root of great sound, and the engineers at FiiO have incorporated DC/AC dual power supply design for you to get the ultimate experience. Inside the R7 is a 30W switching power supply. The AC input circuit employs filtering and purification with a large-capacity choke and dedicated high-voltage capacitors. The DC input circuit is of a Â±12V high-voltage power supply design. Both power circuits contribute to the robustness of the power supply system to better give that dynamic sound to your music. The FiiO R7 can also be used with external DC power supplies, such as the FiiO PL50 linear power supply or other power supplies giving your sound an even purer, blacker background making the musical details pop.

settings.title: Feature Sets That Make You Ask For Nothing More
settings.content: You have full access to the Google Play Store, and the 6-inch screen is excellent for exploring the stock Android experience. The Fiio R9 is a fantastic network streamer because of the company's proprietary adaptations, which include Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.1, Roon integration, a MicroSD card slot, and USB-C compatibility. The FiiO R9 can offer a clear sound free of distortion because of the excellent built-in DAC & Amp. The FiiO R9 is a simple solution for your demanding needs. It is capable of many tasks, including a transmitter, streaming media player, decoder, amplifier, and preamp.Â

settings.title: DLNA & Roon Ready
settings.content: The FiiO R7 acts as your control hub for accessing your music when connected to a NAS and playing music through DLNA. It is Roon Ready certified, allowing you to access music from a ROON CORE source such as a NAS or a computer. And if that is not enough, the R7 itself can act as a network music server thanks to being compatible with the DLNA transmission protocols. Through DLNA, on another device, you can access the music on the R7's internal storage, micro-SD cards, and even tracks on a connected external portable drive.

settings.title: Exclusive DP Mode
settings.content: You can use the exclusive DP mode, to connect to an external display, a tablet for instance, and operate the unit on a bigger screen. This allows you to experience audio and visuals on a bigger screen using R7 as the source.

settings.title: Bluetooth V5.1
settings.content: Enjoy Hi-Res Audio quality without wires thanks to LDAC & aptX HD premium wireless codec.

settings.title: MQA Decoding
settings.content: The New FiiO R9 includes MQA technology, which enables you to play back MQA audio files.

settings.title: FiiO Music App Support
settings.content: You can download the FiiO music app from the Google Play store or App store.

The FiiO R9 is an incredibly versatile and practical all-in-one streamer, DAC, and headphone amplifier that offers possibly the most comprehensive set of I/O options, well customized to seamlessly integrate into desktop or speaker setup.

settings.title: What is FiiO R9 on the whole?
settings.content: FiiO R9, an Android-based streaming DAC and headphone amplifier, showcasing an upgraded design with a high-gloss 'fully liquid metal bicolor' body, RGB light strip, and a 6" 1080p touch panel. Initially equipped with Android 10, the R9 is set to receive an upgrade to Android 12 in Q1 2024. Notable improvements include a dedicated Qualcomm Bluetooth chip for aptX, aptX Adaptive, and aptX HD codecs, as well as a shift to dual ESS Labs 9030PRO for D/A conversion, enhancing audio performance. The THX788+ chipset-driven headphone amplifier now boasts eight active channels, delivering a formidable 7 Watts of power for demanding headphones. While retaining the analogue outputs of 2 x RCA and 2 x XLR, the R9 introduces HDMI ARC alongside USB, coaxial, and TOSLINK digital inputs, offering enhanced connectivity, including potential TV audio integration.

settings.title: What are the various inputs/outputs like?
settings.content: The front panel has 6.35mm (SE), 4-pin XLR & 4.4mm Balanced headphone outputs. The FiiO R9 gets you covered with the standard and widely used headphone outputs. The rear panel is where the magic lies. It hosts a microSD card slot which supports up to 2TB if you like to play offline files on the go. It has Single-Ended RCA and 3-pin XLR Balanced lineouts. Surprisingly it also has a USB host interface that supports external USB devices like decoders, hard disks, keyboards, and expansion hubs. It also offers Optical & Coaxial IN/OUT and an Ethernet port for wired connection to a network. The USB Type-C port (USB 3.0) on the FiiO R9 supports data transfer, DP output mode, USB DAC, and USB HOST-related functions. The FiiO R9 has a Bluetooth and WiFi antenna embedded into the rear panel with a power switch allowing you to switch between DC or AC power supply.

settings.title: Does it support streaming?
settings.content: Yep! You can download streaming apps from Google Play Store like Tidal, Spotify, Apple music, etc.

settings.title: What is the Android version that it supports?
settings.content: It supports Android Open OS.

settings.title: What DAC chips are incorporated into the FiiO R9?
settings.content: For the brand-new FiiO R9 has incorporated dual ESS Sabre ES9038PRO DAC chip in its circuitry.
